menu.title: Menu
about.title: About Us
about.whoWeAre.description: Maraksh is a cafe that combines Moroccan authenticity with modern style. We offer an exceptional coffee experience in the heart of Medina.
about.ourVision.description: We strive to be the preferred destination for coffee and delicious food lovers in Medina.
about.journey.coffee.title: Our Coffee Journey
about.journey.coffee.description: From bean to cup, we craft each coffee with passion and precision, to bring you the finest flavors from around the world. Our journey began with a simple dream: to share the authentic taste of Moroccan coffee culture.
about.journey.atmosphere.title: Authentic Atmosphere
about.journey.atmosphere.description: Step into our world where traditional Moroccan hospitality meets modern comfort, creating an unforgettable experience. Every corner tells a story of heritage and warmth.
about.journey.ingredients.title: Premium Ingredients
about.journey.ingredients.description: We select only the finest ingredients, from premium coffee beans to fresh herbs, to ensure every sip is exceptional. Quality is our promise to you.
contact.title: Contact Us
contact.reviews.title: Customer Reviews and Add a Review
contact.reviews.description: Click here to view previous reviews and add your own review
